content: this is a modification of chart b of baby norgi http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/baby-norgi after a thread in patterns suggested a procreating ungulant hat would be cool to have this chart is for the deer only and a suggestion of how to plug it into the we call them pirates 1 hat **please note ** you are ofcourse free to do what you like with finished projects featuring this chart no really knock yourself out also to the unsuspecting spectator it might look like there are two males in this chart i made it having reindeer in mind so who knows what gender our frolicking friends are the later in the season the higher the probability they re both female 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/we-call-them-pirates
